title: Indian Education Assistant
status: Part Time, 20 hours per weekMinimum Requirements:Associate's degreeor48 semester hours from an accredited college/universityorpassing results on an approved Paraprofessional Assessment.Valid Utah Driver's License required.Prior experience with the American Indian Culture and familiarity with American Indian customs is helpful, but not required.The salary for this position is assigned to Level 2 of the SC Salary Schedule.To view the salary schedule, please select the following linkSC Salary Schedule.Attachment(s):Indian Education Assistant.pdfEmail To A FriendPrint Version
